record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3564
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3564 -- (Senate - October 25, 2007)

[Page: S13391]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, H.R. 3564 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the title of the bill for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3564) to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the Administrative Conference of the United States through fiscal year 2011, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now object to any further proceedings.

record.chair: The bill will be placed on the calendar.
